title: ReiNX Toolkit
author: Reisyukaku
description: Option extension to the ReiNX project
details:
Its an option extension to the ReiNX project that is comprised of many juicy features!

Features:

Dumps NAND/Cal0/Boot0/Boot1
Toggles AutoRCM
Splash.bin converter/changer (accepts formats such as jpg/bmp/png)
Reboot/Power off option
Update the toolkit from within the toolkit
changelog:
1.2

Merge pull request #13 from D3fau4/master

fixed bad compilation problem

1.1

Update the ReiNX CFW
Toggle AutoRCM
Kip manager
Dump NAND/Cal0/Boot0/Boot1
Convert splash screen given a jpg/png/bmp to splash.bin
Reboot / shutdown
